title: There is no redemption for humans, we are all doomed
selftext: I mean what the fuck is wrong with people, how sadistic someone has to be to do this, poisoning a mute animal, what fuck.. I am so angry right now.. I'm shivering... Most of people in this country are believers.. What do they think their God gonna say about this.. Or we all should just accept there is no fucking God in this forsaken world... Even judiciary doesn't give a fuck..punishment for killing a stray is fucking 50 rs fine.. A 50 fucking rupoes... Where the fuck we are going.. Poor dog was struggling to even scream with pian.. What fuck man.. That whole locality should just burn.. I just hopw whoever done this.. And whoever knows who done this and did not stopped their kids family should suffer 100 times.. Their screams should be heard through a distance.. They should amd i really hope. I'm an atheist but i pray.. They suffer 100 times more.. No animal deserves this.. They just hope for food from us.. They ate not cunning like humans.. They don't want to build properties.. Just some food man... Why tbe fuck would anybody do this.. ðŸ˜”ðŸ˜”ðŸ˜”This world should just end..
